text: @CNN @MaeveReston Trump once again sought to deepen racial & cultural divisions rather than attempting to unify during the crises of the coronavirus pandemic & a reckoning on racism. He has a long track record of exploiting racial tensions. His focus - defending Confederate monuments & namesakes.
